viewtier.ui
Class Raw

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--viewtier.ui.Component
        |
        +--viewtier.ui.Raw
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public abstract class Raw
extends Component

Content of the Raw component is copied directly to the client. Component Raw serves purpose of custom framework extension.

See Also:

Method Detail

getContent

public abstract java.lang.StringBuffer getContent()
Any extension class inherited from Raw should implemented this method. Content of the StringBuffer returned by this method will be copied directly to a client.
